duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide strategic leadership for technical program delivery and product management, aligning with business goals.
Manage product releases based on business strategy and maintain governance for work intake.
Develop product cost models and analytics, benchmarking services against the market.
Identify and mitigate technical risks throughout the delivery life cycle.
Lead business discussion and strategy alignment for global workload service direction.
Participate in IT budget development and review, ensuring alignment with business priorities.
Establish vision, identify best practices, and drive efficiency, accountability, and ownership across the organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in computer science or STEM majors (Master’s degree preferred)
